Events.RelatedBody:
Downloaded and unpacked v2.10.0-beta1.zip. Opened Open-XML-SDK.sln in VS 2017. 
Build->Build solution. Fail:
Error MSB4044 The "GetAssemblyVersion" task was not given a value for the required parameter "NuGetVersion"

Merged pull request "Replace SDB particle validation infrastructure with more declarative model" (#603) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: The SDB particle validation infrastructure was very difficult to reason about and used indirections within a binary database to construct the data for validation. This has been moved to simply declare the expected particles and then generate a validator for those.
